The question is *WHY* did the binary project have the CVS nature??

Maybe because it once was under CVS and then I changed to a new layout? All my
binary projects are setup like this. And AFAIK I created a new workspace with
PDE and added all the projects as _external_ (i.e. not copying resources to the
actual workspace dir but leaving them at the original place).

I assume you were in the Packages view.
There is an existing PR on this - its not filtering the properties 
contributions by nature.

If you weren't in the Packages view then pls reopen.
